name: Keep the light On
description:
This prototype has been developed by d0td0t in one week for the "One Ressource Jam 2017".

Try to escape the loop of reincarnation in  this multiverse, where nanotechs seems to have developed proto-consciousness.

Explore and collect NanoControllers in order to buy and craft (not yet ) new equipment.

Control:

 Keyboard ---- Xbox controller

Move:    

AWSD ---- Left Stick

LightCtrl:

←↑→↓ ---- RightStick

Map:     

E ---- Y

Shop Selection:

←→ ---- RightStick

Buy:     

A ---- A

Quit:    

Alt+F4
